item.description:
We'll start again at the Dunks in Cleveland Circle, and then walk up Beacon and through the streets between Beacon and Comm ave. I'll work out the map soon, but we'll probably do a few miles and end up in Coolidge Corner.

Here's the map.

We'll tackle Summit Ave, and then check out the JFK National Historic Site, whatever that is. I saw it on Google Maps, but I'm not sure what it is. If people want, we can grab food somewhere around Coolidge Corner too.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email my cell # to the RSVPs.
item.name: Cleveland Circle, walk between Beacon and Comm Ave
